sn19.10:4.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ kumbhaṇḍaṃ purisaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ.
sn19.10:4.2: So gacchantopi teva aṇḍe khandhe āropetvā gacchati.
sn19.10:4.4: Tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19.10:4.6: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe gāmakūṭako ahosi … pe ….
